1261190.name: Dungeon Scavenger - Inferno
1261190.description:
Dungeon Scavenger®: Inferno is the first expansion for our highly liked game. The DLC extends the original game by taking the campaign into the own Demons inferno world.

Features:
  • New Perks! New tab in Stats to use the experience to buy cool perks.
  • There is a new capstone Perk for classes that include Master: You can have Demons as pets.
  • Each class now has access to a dungeon perk to start at level 1. Barbarians do not use stamina and sorcerers move by teleport only.
  • 10 more levels to explore, take on the demons themselves.
  • A new Ring slot. All equipment now can have a buff such as Protection: Casts X Armor enhancement on you at start of combat.
  • Unlimited equipment! With 241 equipment, 33 buffs and 9 spell types, there are 71,577 unique equipment in the game.
  • Now the Minions level up with you. Terrorize the depths with a overgrown bunny!
  • New demon realm with over 150 new monsters with with new abilities, including multiple resistances that include physical immunity.. A dangerous boss that commands the demon invasion needs to be defeated.
  • New items for all levels. Including an item that combines 3 same kind equipment into a higher tier.
  • Lots more to find.

Join us in this new adventure.
1261190.supported_languages:
英语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲*, 德语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
